TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FigureHorizontalAnchor extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes a position reference for a figure in a horizontal direction.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalOffset%2A> attribute of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> element.
[!code-xml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FigurePropsXAML](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/FloaterFigureSnippets/Window1.xaml#_figurepropsxaml)]
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.HorizontalOffset%2A> property programmatically.
[!code-cs[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FigureProps](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/FloaterFigureSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#_figureprops)] [!code-vb[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FigureProps](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/floaterfiguresnippets/window1.xaml.vb#_figureprops)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.FigureHorizontalAnchor ColumnCenter = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Anchor the figure in the center of the column content area.
